info.name: Browse Pinterest without logging in
info.description: This style removes the dark background, enables scrolling and removes the "Sign up to see more" box.
info.additionalInfo:
Since the front page of Pinterest is a dummy background and not actual blocked out content, it only works for boards, pins, users etc.

Try browsing this page for instance: https://www.pinterest.com/search/pins/?q=css

data.title: out of date; try this style...
